NOTE TO AUTHOR:  Highlighted, italicized text throughout this template is provided solely as background information to assist you in creating this document.  Please delete all such text, as well as the instructions in each section, prior to submitting this document.  ONLY YOUR PROJECT-SPECIFIC INFORMATION SHOULD APPEAR IN THE FINAL VERSION OF THIS DOCUMENT.

INFO: The Software Verification Plan document outlines the planned tasks and expectations for verification of Software Requirements.

  • WHO will be responsible for completion, review, and approval of these tasks.
  • HOW the verification will be performed including failure resolution.
  • WHAT documentation/deliverables will be generated.

TO DO: List any other documents or Web addresses to which this document refers. Provide enough information so that the reader could access a copy of each reference, including title, author, version number, date, and source or location. E.g.:


All the Electrical and Mechanical Requirements need to be verified:

TO DO: Describe an approach how to perform the verification procedures on test items.

TO DO: Specify test pass conditions and what to do in case of test failure.

TO DO: Specify the criteria used to suspend all or a portion of the testing activity on the test items associated with this plan. Specify the testing activities that must be repeated, when testing is resumed.

TO DO: List all the environments on what the tests need to be performed. 

INFO: The following sections contain Task items that define what is necessary to prepare for and perform testing.

TO DO: Cover responsibilities, staffing and training needs, risks and contingencies, and the test schedule.
